name: stark-srcs
description: Stark - a framework for Angular apps
author: Stark Team <alexis.georges@nbb.be>

scripts.build:showcase: cd showcase && npm run build:prod && cd ..
scripts.build:showcase:ghpages: cd showcase && npm run build:prod:ghpages && cd ..
scripts.build:starter: cd starter && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:stark-build && npm run clean:stark-testing && npm run clean:stark-core && npm run clean:stark-ui && npm run clean:stark-rbac && npm run clean:starter && npm run clean:showcase
scripts.clean:stark-build: cd packages/stark-build && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean:stark-core: cd packages/stark-core && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean:stark-rbac: cd packages/stark-rbac && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean:stark-testing: cd packages/stark-testing && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean:stark-ui: cd packages/stark-ui && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean:showcase: cd showcase && npx rimraf ./dist && npx rimraf ./node_modules/@nationalbankbelgium ./node_modules/__ngcc_entry_points__.json && cd ..
scripts.clean:slate: npm run clean:all && npm run clean:modules:all && npm install && npm run install:all
scripts.clean:starter: cd starter && npx rimraf ./dist && npx rimraf ./node_modules/@nationalbankbelgium ./node_modules/__ngcc_entry_points__.json && cd ..
scripts.clean:modules:all: npm run clean:modules && npm run clean:modules:stark-build && npm run clean:modules:stark-core && npm run clean:modules:stark-ui && npm run clean:modules:stark-rbac && npm run clean:modules:starter && npm run clean:modules:showcase
scripts.clean:modules:stark-build: cd packages/stark-build && npm run clean:modules && cd ../..
scripts.clean:modules:stark-core: cd packages/stark-core && npm run clean:modules && cd ../..
scripts.clean:modules:stark-rbac: cd packages/stark-rbac && npm run clean:modules && cd ../..
scripts.clean:modules:stark-ui: cd packages/stark-ui && npm run clean:modules dist && cd ../..
scripts.clean:modules:showcase: cd showcase && npm run clean:modules && cd ..
scripts.clean:modules:starter: cd starter && npm run clean:modules && cd ..
scripts.docs: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:all
scripts.docs:all: npm run docs:stark-core:generate && npm run docs:stark-ui:generate && npm run docs:stark-rbac:generate && npm run docs:starter:generate
scripts.docs:coverage: npm run docs:stark-core:coverage && npm run docs:stark-ui:coverage && npm run docs:stark-rbac:coverage && npm run docs:starter:coverage
scripts.docs:coverage:packages: npm run docs:stark-core:coverage && npm run docs:stark-ui:coverage && npm run docs:stark-rbac:coverage
scripts.docs:stark-core:coverage: cd packages/stark-core && npm run docs:coverage && cd ../..
scripts.docs:stark-core:generate: cd packages/stark-core && npm run docs && cd ../..
scripts.docs:stark-core:serve: cd packages/stark-core && npm run docs:serve && cd ../..
scripts.docs:stark-rbac:coverage: cd packages/stark-rbac && npm run docs:coverage && cd ../..
scripts.docs:stark-rbac:generate: cd packages/stark-rbac && npm run docs && cd ../..
scripts.docs:stark-rbac:serve: cd packages/stark-rbac && npm run docs:serve && cd ../..
scripts.docs:stark-ui:coverage: cd packages/stark-ui && npm run docs:coverage && cd ../..
scripts.docs:stark-ui:generate: cd packages/stark-ui && npm run docs && cd ../..
scripts.docs:stark-ui:serve: cd packages/stark-ui && npm run docs:serve && cd ../..
scripts.docs:starter:coverage: cd starter && npm run docs:coverage && cd ..
scripts.docs:starter:generate: cd starter && npm run docs && cd ..
scripts.docs:starter:serve: cd starter && npm run docs:serve && cd ..
scripts.lint:stark-core: cd packages/stark-core && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.lint:stark-rbac: cd packages/stark-rbac && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.lint:stark-ui: cd packages/stark-ui && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.lint:showcase: cd showcase && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:starter: cd starter && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:stark-core && npm run lint:stark-ui && npm run lint:stark-rbac && npm run lint:starter && npm run lint:showcase
scripts.lint:packages: npm run lint:stark-core && npm run lint:stark-ui && npm run lint:stark-rbac
scripts.install:all: npm run build && npm run install:starter && npm run install:showcase
scripts.install:ci:all: npm run build:trace && npm run install:starter && npm run install:ci:showcase
scripts.test:all: npm run test:stark-core && npm run test:stark-ui && npm run test:stark-rbac && npm run test:starter && npm run test:showcase
scripts.test:packages: npm run test:stark-core && npm run test:stark-ui && npm run test:stark-rbac
scripts.test:showcase: cd showcase && npm run test-fast && cd ../..
scripts.test:showcase:e2e: cd showcase && npm run e2e && cd ../..
scripts.test:showcase:e2e:browserstack: cd showcase && npm run e2e:browserstack && cd ../..
scripts.test:starter: cd starter && npm run test-fast && cd ../..
scripts.test:starter:e2e: cd starter && npm run e2e && cd ../..
scripts.test:ci:all: npm run test:ci:stark-core && npm run test:ci:stark-ui && npm run test:ci:stark-rbac && npm run test:ci:starter && npm run test:ci:showcase
scripts.test:ci:packages: npm run test:ci:stark-core && npm run test:ci:stark-ui && npm run test:ci:stark-rbac
scripts.test:ci:showcase: cd showcase && npm run test-fast:ci && cd ../..
scripts.test:ci:starter: cd starter && npm run test-fast:ci && cd ../..
